name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.stale.datanode.minimum.interval
description:
Minimum number of missed heartbeats intervals for a datanode to
    be marked stale by the Namenode.  The actual interval is calculated as
    (dfs.namenode.stale.datanode.minimum.interval * dfs.heartbeat.interval)
    in seconds.  If this value is greater than the property
    dfs.namenode.stale.datanode.interval, then the calculated value above
    is used.

name: dfs.namenode.service.handler.count
description:
The number of Namenode RPC server threads that listen to
  requests from DataNodes and from all other non-client nodes.
  dfs.namenode.service.handler.count will be valid only if
  dfs.namenode.servicerpc-address is configured.

name: mapreduce.reduce.cpu.vcores
description:
The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for
  each reduce task.

name: mapreduce.input.lineinputformat.linespermap
description:
When using NLineInputFormat, the number of lines of input data
  to include in each split.

name: fs.s3a.retry.limit
description:
Number of times to retry any repeatable S3 client request on failure,
    excluding throttling requests.

name: hadoop.zk.num-retries
description: Number of tries to connect to ZooKeeper.
